1005080.name: Yukinas Diary
1005080.description:
Story:

In Yukina’s Diary, you play through the diary tale of the heroine Yukina and her companions – written chapter by chapter to move generations.

Yukina returns to her castle, only to witness how her world falls apart. Yet she makes the decision not to give up. Plagued by doubt, she fights to survive in a harsh world – and to hold on to hope.

Her companions on this journey couldn’t be more different:

A knight drowning his sorrow in taverns.

An elf taught to avoid humans – yet trying not to judge them.

Together, they write history. And Yukina’s diary becomes the voice that remains.

Character introduction:

What remains is the diary.

And the question of what you’ll discover within it.

The current Early Access phase includes

The first 32 hours of gameplay!

The upcoming full Version will include the following:

  • over 50 hours of gameplay

  • over 140 Enemies

  • over 180 Equipment Items

  • over 5 Character Classes

  • over 40 trading Cards that can be collected in exchange for special Items or used for special Skills!

Hotkeys

Press F4 Get Fullscreen.

Press F5 Restart the Game.

Demo Version:

Playable are the first 6 hours

Save Games

If you decide to get the full Version of Yukinas Diary, the save games will not be transferred automatically, but you can add them manually and continue playing the full Version directly from where you saved the game.

Click on Library in Steam. Right click on Yukina's Diary Demo. Go to Manage and select Browse Local Files. Go to the folder

Copy the folder save.

Select the full version of Yukinas Diary. Right click on manage local files. In the folder www you paste the copied folder.

Hint

I also came up with something Special for the Early Access participants:

As a Follower of my Twitch Channel you will receive giveaways that allow you to immortalize yourself in the Game during the Early Access phase. More info on my Twitch channel, which you can access directly from the game itself. This privilege will expire as soon as the Game is released as a full Version. Be a part of something big.
